summary: Request minimod - all vampires have red eyes
descriptionHtml:
Creation Kit has been acting up lately; first it started crashing, now it refuses to let me drag additional files into the 'create archive' box;
I had to make bsa file using the old archive.exe, so I'm not sure if it'll even work, but I'm too tired and frustrated to do any testing today.
It's a response to this request: https://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/3829515-seranaholic-red-eyes-for-all-vampires/
In theory, it gives all the in-game vampires red eyes from seranaholic mod. Hope it works.
author: Syntia13
